text: Bengt Einar Zimmerman (26 September 1905 – 12 November 1976)Background notes on The Roll of Distinguished Philatelists September 2011, Roll of Distinguished Philatelists Trust, London, 2011. Archived here. was a Finnish philatelist who was added to the Roll of Distinguished Philatelists in 1975. ==References== Category:Signatories to the Roll of Distinguished Philatelists Category:1905 births Category:1976 deaths Category:Finnish philatelists
title: Bengt Zimmerman
